content.raw: there's very limited documentation on the implementation left by the original author. I only found a couple of slides describing some math behind it, which I'll share in [here](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1jzOezydv9n2x3OS_8XRF8fjqDCa83qhFwnVWbvfx3Qs/edit?usp=sharing). @JChoclin has made [some progress in his fork](https://bitbucket.org/JChoclin/gazebo/src/2ea1d7799cf4418c5d211e03061a02e3b4f10ae9/?at=gpu_vertical_javier) so you may want to start from there.
